scripts.dev: concurrently -t -n client,python,whatsapp -c blue,green,yellow "npm run client:dev" "npm run python:dev" "npm run whatsapp:api"
scripts.client:dev: cd client && set NO_COLOR=1&& npm run dev
scripts.python:dev: cd server && python -m uvicorn main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 3010 --reload --reload-dir . --reload-exclude "*.pyc" --reload-exclude "__pycache__" --log-level warning
scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p='.env';if(!fs.existsSync(p))fs.copyFileSync('.env.template',p)" && npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && cd whatsapp-rpc && npm install
